price: 16. To boye bozali na ebateli libanda na oyo azali na likolo été akoki kokotisa bino na mabele kasi bokomona ete mabele ekoningana?
arabic: ءَأَمِنتُم مَّن فِي ٱلسَّمَآءِ أَن يَخۡسِفَ بِكُمُ ٱلۡأَرۡضَ فَإِذَا هِيَ تَمُورُ

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: a-amintum man fī al-samāi an yakhsifa bikumu al-arḍa fa-idhā hiya tamūru
